title: Tsunami warning cancelled after magnitude 7 earthquake strikes California coast
content: A tsunami warning was issued along the coasts of northern California and southern Oregon, but was later cancelled.
summary: A tsunami warning was issued along the coasts of northern California and southern Oregon, but was later cancelled.

title: Emmanuel Macron vows to name new French PM within days
content: Macron rejected calls to resign, a day after his prime minister was ousted in a no-confidence vote.
summary: Macron rejected calls to resign, a day after his prime minister was ousted in a no-confidence vote.

title: Syrian rebels capture second major city after military withdraws
content: Hama is south of Aleppo, which the rebels seized last week after launching a lightning offensive.
summary: Hama is south of Aleppo, which the rebels seized last week after launching a lightning offensive.

title: First EU visit for Russian foreign minister since invasion
content: Sergei Lavrov is in Malta for a two-day summit of the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe.
summary: Sergei Lavrov is in Malta for a two-day summit of the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe.

title: Romania's far right presidential frontrunner vows to end Ukraine aid
content: Calin Georgescu, who leads Romania's presidential race, tells the BBC he would end support for Ukraine if elected.
summary: Calin Georgescu, who leads Romania's presidential race, tells the BBC he would end support for Ukraine if elected.

title: Italian police arrest nun over links to mafia
content: The sister, a volunteer in a prison, is accused of ferrying messages to convicted 'Ndrangheta members.
summary: The sister, a volunteer in a prison, is accused of ferrying messages to convicted 'Ndrangheta members.

title: Iceland issues controversial five-year whaling permits
content: The permits allow for annual catches of 209 fin whales and 217 mike whales.
summary: The permits allow for annual catches of 209 fin whales and 217 mike whales.

title: S Korean leader under pressure as impeachment vote looms
content: Yoon Suk Yeol is facing protests and a police investigation into his shock martial law decree.

title: Disappearances double in Sinaloa amid Mexican cartel rift
content: The security forces scored a victory with a huge fentanyl bust but levels of violence remain high.

title: Amnesty accuses Israel of genocide against Palestinians in Gaza
content: Israel denies the accusation, saying it is defending itself against Hamas attacks in accordance with international law.

title: Housemate convicted of horrific murder of Kenyan LGBT activist
content: The body of Edwin Chiloba was found dumped in a box last year, sparking global condemnation.

title: Canada man jumps on polar bear to defend wife from attack
content: The man suffered serious but non-life threatening injuries during the incident in the country's far north.

title: What next for Bitcoin after bursting $100k barrier?

title: Mattel sued over porn site misprint on Wicked dolls
